titleStmt.title: The marrovv of the oracles of God. Or, diuers treatises containing directions about sixe of the waightiest things can concerne a Christian in this life. by N. Bifield, late preacher of Gods Word at Isleworth in Middlesex.
titleStmt.author: Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622.
Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622. Beginning of the doctrine of Christ. aut
Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622. Spirituall touchstone. aut
Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622. Signes of the wicked man. aut
Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622. Promises. aut
Rules of a holy life. aut
Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622. Cure of the feare of death. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Legatt, and are to bee sold by P. Stephens, and C. Meredith, at the golden Lyon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Cambridge University Library copy has part 1 of STC 4229 added in its proper place but retains the 2E8r sub title page: Principles, fourth edition, I. Legatt for R. Allen, 1630.--Cf. STC.
In 6 parts, each with separate dated title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the golden Lyon in Pauls Church-yard
